Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.DefaultHttpRequest
    Use HttpRequest.streaming(HttpHeaders).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.DefaultHttpResponse
    Use HttpResponse.streaming().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.DeferredHttpResponse
    Use HttpResponse.from(CompletionStage).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries
    Use Flags instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpHeaderNames.KEEP_ALIVE
    Use HttpHeaderNames.CONNECTION instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpHeaderNames.PROXY_CONNECTION
    Use HttpHeaderNames.CONNECTION instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_BINARY
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.BINARY. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_COMPACT
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.COMPACT. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_JSON
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.JSON. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_TEXT
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.TEXT. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.stream.StreamMessage.closeFuture()
    Use StreamMessage.completionFuture() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.Response.closeFuture()
    Use Response.completionFuture() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doDelete(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doDelete(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doGet(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doGet(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doHead(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doHead(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doOptions(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doOptions(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doPatch(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doPatch(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doPost(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doPost(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doPut(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doPut(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService.doTrace(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest, HttpResponseWriter)
    Use AbstractHttpService.doTrace(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.fromMediaType(String)
    Use SerializationFormat.find(MediaType...).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries.isEpollAvailable()
    Use Flags.useEpoll() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries.isOpenSslAvailable()
    Use Flags.useOpenSsl() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.Exceptions.isVerbose()
    Use Flags.verboseExceptions() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceRequestContext.logger()
    Use a logging framework integration such as RequestContextExportingAppender in armeria-logback.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceConfig.loggerName()
    Use a logging framework integration such as RequestContextExportingAppender in armeria-logback.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware(ChannelFutureListener)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware(FutureListener<T>)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware(GenericFutureListener<T>)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.LoggingService.newDecorator(LogLevel)
    Use LoggingServiceBuilder.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging.LoggingClient.newDecorator(LogLevel)
    Use LoggingClientBuilder.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.endpoint.healthcheck.HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroup.of(ClientFactory, EndpointGroup, String, Duration)
    use HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.endpoint.healthcheck.HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroup.of(EndpointGroup, String, Duration)
    use HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.Endpoint.of(String, int, int)
    Use Endpoint.of(String, int) and Endpoint.withWeight(int), e.g. Endpoint.of("foo.com", 80).withWeight(500).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponse.ofFailed(Throwable)
    Use HttpResponse.ofFailure(Throwable) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.ofThrift()
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.values().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.onEnter(Runnable)
    Use RequestContext.onEnter(Consumer) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.onExit(Runnable)
    Use RequestContext.onExit(Consumer) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.port(InetSocketAddress, String)
    Use ServerBuilder.http(InetSocketAddress) or ServerBuilder.https(InetSocketAddress).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.port(int, String)
    Use ServerBuilder.http(int) or ServerBuilder.https(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerPort.protocol()
    Use ServerPort.protocols().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.rejectPromise(Promise<?>, Throwable)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries.report()
    This method will be removed without a replacement, because the information about the availability of the native libraries are now logged automatically by Flags.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.resolvePromise(Promise<?>, Object)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(AggregatedHttpMessage)
    Use HttpResponseWriter.close(AggregatedHttpMessage).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus)
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus, MediaType, byte[])
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus, MediaType, byte[]).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus, MediaType, byte[], int, int)
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus, MediaType, byte[], int, int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus, MediaType, HttpData)
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus, MediaType, HttpData).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus, MediaType, HttpData, HttpHeaders)
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus, MediaType, HttpData, HttpHeaders).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus, MediaType, String)
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus, MediaType, String).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(HttpStatus, MediaType, String, Object...)
    Use HttpResponse.of(HttpStatus, MediaType, String, Object...).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond(int)
    Use HttpResponse.of(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.service(PathMapping, Service<HttpRequest, HttpResponse>, String)
    Use a logging framework integration such as RequestContextExportingAppender in armeria-logback.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.serviceAt(String, Service<HttpRequest, HttpResponse>)
    Use ServerBuilder.service(String, Service) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition.AbstractCompositeServiceBuilder.serviceAt(String, Service<I, O>)
    Use AbstractCompositeServiceBuilder.service(String, Service) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.sslContext(SessionProtocol, File, File)
    Use ServerBuilder.tls(File, File).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.sslContext(SessionProtocol, File, File, String)
    Use ServerBuilder.tls(File, File, String).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.sslContext(SslContext)
    Use ServerBuilder.tls(SslContext).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.metric.MoreMeters.summaryWithDefaultQuantiles(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable<Tag>)
    Use MoreMeters.newDistributionSummary(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.metric.MoreMeters.timerWithDefaultQuantiles(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable<Tag>)
    Use MoreMeters.newTimer(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.AggregatedHttpMessage.toHttpRequest()
    Use HttpRequest.of(AggregatedHttpMessage).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.AggregatedHttpMessage.toHttpResponse()
    Use HttpResponse.of(AggregatedHttpMessage).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.Exceptions.traceText(Throwable)
    Use Throwables.getStackTraceAsString(Throwable).
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging.LoggingClient(Client<I, O>)
    Use LoggingService.newDecorator().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging.LoggingClient(Client<I, O>, LogLevel)
    Use LoggingClientBuilder.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.LoggingService(Service<I, O>)
    Use LoggingService.newDecorator().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.LoggingService(Service<I, O>, LogLevel)
    Use LoggingServiceBuilder.
    com.linecorp.armeria.testing.server.SelfSignedCertificateRule(Date, Date)
    Use SelfSignedCertificateRule.SelfSignedCertificateRule(TemporalAccessor, TemporalAccessor).
    com.linecorp.armeria.testing.server.SelfSignedCertificateRule(String, Date, Date)
    Use SelfSignedCertificateRule.SelfSignedCertificateRule(String, TemporalAccessor, TemporalAccessor).
    com.linecorp.armeria.testing.server.SelfSignedCertificateRule(String, SecureRandom, int, Date, Date)
    Use SelfSignedCertificateRule.SelfSignedCertificateRule(String, SecureRandom, int, TemporalAccessor, TemporalAccessor)
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.zookeeper.ZooKeeperUpdatingListener(String, String, int)
    Use ZooKeeperUpdatingListenerBuilder.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.zookeeper.ZooKeeperUpdatingListener(String, String, int, Endpoint)
    Use ZooKeeperUpdatingListenerBuilder.
